question: Alexander Zverev has won the 2017 Men's singles Rome Masters tennis tournament. He hails from which country?
explanation: Alexander Zverev (20), a German professional tennis player, has won the 2017 Men\'s singles Rome Masters tennis tournament by defeating four-time champion Novak Djokovic in the final by 6-3, 6-4 in Rome, Italy. With this win, Zverev became the youngest player since Djokovic in 2007 to win a Masters 1000 title and the first player born in the 1990s to do so. Beside this, Elina Svitolina of Ukraine has won the womenâ€™s singles Italian Open tennis title Simona Halep of Romania.
